text: Thomas Ross DiLuglio (November 25, 1931Profile of Thomas R. DiLuglio â€” December 2024) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Democratic Party. DiLuglio was born in Providence, Rhode Island. He was the 62nd Lieutenant Governor of Rhode Island from 1977 until 1985. DiLuglio died in December 2024, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Lieutenant Governors of Rhode Island Category:Politicians from Providence, Rhode Island Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Rhode Island
title: Thomas R. DiLuglio
